attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Unless you are born in this country and can prove you are native you should not be entitled to any benefit at all.
The British "people" not the goverment foot the bill because the goverment are to soft.
once immigrants realise the gravy train has run dry they will stop begging and clear off.
We should take a leaf out of the US and Oz's book and send them away.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a call for action, not a name.

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ISWFTRTB/
		http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/language/

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
